snippet.title: Severed Steel - Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
A stylish and visceral single-player FPS featuring a fluid stunt system, destructible voxel environments, loads of bullet time, a unique one-armed protagonist, and a dark electronic soundtrack. The developer breaks down common player tactics used in the Severed Steel demo in this gameplay trailer, showcased durig Guerrilla Collective Day 2.

#Gaming
